title: why there are unranked in gold games
body: i was playing ranked and my adc{{champion:222}}  was unranked and fed the whole game, after game i cheked her profile, and in this seson he had only 2 games, and 1 ranked game, and idk if riot gonna fix this or not but its isnt the first time im dealing with these kind of players and his name is 69przepro69

replies.body: That guy was probably playing his provisional games, but his Rank from last season still placed him high enough to possibly be in Gold this season. You were placed with him based on your MMR's being similar regardless of your actual rank.
